authoring_dialog_im_enable_public.description: Label text for the enable public Idea Manager toggle switch in the Idea Manager settings dialog window.

authoring_dialog_title_nameinput.value: Please enter a name for this project:
authoring_dialog_title_nameinput.description: Text instructing user to enter a name for the project in the edit project title dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_multi_selected_e.description: Error text when a user presses the submit button when multiple files are selected in the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_none_selected_er.description: Error text when a user presses the submit button when no files are selected in the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_select_title.description: Title for the manage project files dialog window when in select mode.

authoring_dialog_assets_select_title_aud.description: Title for the manage project files dialog window when in audio select mode.

authoring_dialog_assets_select_title_vid.description: Title for the manage project files dialog window when in video select mode.

authoring_dialog_assets_select_title_fla.description: Title for the manage project files dialog window when in Flash select mode.

authoring_dialog_assets_max_storage_erro.value: Sorry, adding this file will put you over the maximum storage allowed for this project. Please delete some files and try again.
authoring_dialog_assets_max_storage_erro.description: Error message when user attempts to upload a file that will exceed max storage capacity in the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_max_storage_exce.value: Warning: You have exceeded the maximum file storage capacity for this project. To upload more, please delete some existing files.
authoring_dialog_assets_max_storage_exce.description: Error message when project has exceeded max storage capacity in the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_header.description: Text for the header of the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_table_used.description: Text for the header of the usage column in the assets table of the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_notused.description: Text alerting user that a file is not used in any steps in the project in the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_isused.description: Text alerting user that a file is used in the following step(s) in the project in the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_inactiveused.description: Text alerting user that a file is only used in the following inactive step(s) in the project in the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_inactive.description: Label for an inactive step in the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_ref_path.value: The HTML reference for an image named myimage.png will be: <img src="assets/myimage.png" alt="description of image" />.
authoring_dialog_assets_ref_path.description: Text that shows user how to reference an uploaded asset in the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_upload_link.description: Text for the upload file link in the manage project files dialog.

authoring_dialog_assets_storage_label.description: Text to display the used storage space in the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_upload_dropzone.value: Click the button to the left or drag and drop files here to upload
authoring_dialog_assets_upload_dropzone.description: Text identify the area on which users can drop files to upload them in the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_upload_header.description: Text to display as the header for the upload progress area in the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_file_dimensions.description: Text to display the dimensions of the currently selected file in the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_multi_select.description: Text to display when multiple files are selected in the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_filetype_error.value: Sorry, this file type is not allowed.
authoring_dialog_assets_filetype_error.description: Error message displayed when user tries to upload a filetype that is not allowed in the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_folder_error.value: Sorry, uploading folders is not allowed.
authoring_dialog_assets_folder_error.description: Error message displayed when user tries to upload a folder in the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_duplicate_skippe.description: Message displayed when user decides not to overwrite an uploaded file in the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_confirm_overwrit.value: A file with the name "{0}" already exists. Do you want to overwrite this file?

authoring_dialog_assets_max_upload_limit.value:
Note: A maximum of {0} files per upload is allowed.

The first {0} files you selected will be added to the project. You can upload the remaining {1} file(s) after this upload has completed.
authoring_dialog_assets_max_upload_limit.description: Alert to display when user attempts to upload more than the max number of files at one time in the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_uploading.description: Message displayed when a file is being uploaded in the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_upload_size_erro.value: Error: Please make sure you do not try to upload files larger than {1}.
authoring_dialog_assets_upload_size_erro.description: Error message displayed when file size exceeds max storage capacity in the manage project files dialog.

authoring_dialog_assets_upload_exceed_ca.description: Error message displayed when uploading file would exceed max storage capacity in the manage project files dialog.

authoring_dialog_assets_upload_perm_erro.value: Sorry, you are not authorized to upload files to this project. If you believe this is an error, please contact the project owner or a WISE administrator.
authoring_dialog_assets_upload_perm_erro.description: Error message displayed when user tries to upload a file without permission in the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_upload_generic_e.value: Sorry, there was an error uploading file. Please try again or contact WISE support.
authoring_dialog_assets_upload_generic_e.description: Error message displayed for a generic upload error in the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_upload_success.description: Success message for an uploaded file in the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_upload_space_war.value: Note: Some web browsers don't handle spaces in URLs correctly. If you reference this file in any step's HTML, be sure all the spaces are replaced with "%20" (i.e. assets/{0}).
authoring_dialog_assets_upload_space_war.description: Warning text for when an uploaded file contains space characters in the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_delete_perm_erro.value: Sorry, you are not authorized to delete files from this project. If you believe this is an error, please contact the project owner or a WISE administrator.
authoring_dialog_assets_delete_perm_erro.description: Error message displayed when user tries to delete a file without permission in the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_delete_success.description: Message displayed when user successfully deletes a file in the manage project files dialog window.

authoring_dialog_assets_download_perm_er.value: Sorry, you are not authorized to download files from this project. If you believe this is an error, please contact the project owner or a WISE administrator.
authoring_dialog_assets_download_perm_er.description: Error message displayed when user tries to download a file without permission in the manage project files dialog window.

help_authoring_assets_info.value:
File Storage

Each WISE project is provided {0} of storage space.

    The following file types are permitted:
  • Image: {1}
  • Video: {2}
  • Audio: {3}
  • Flash (& Flash Video): {4}
  • Java: {5}
  • Other: {6}
help_authoring_assets_info.description: Help content for the project file manager, including storage limit and allowed file types.

help_authoring_logginglevel_info.description: Help content explaining the logging level toggle

help_authoring_meta_general_info.value:
The information provided here will appear in the WISE Project Library (for users who have access to the project).

Try to include as much information as possible so that potential teachers can learn about your project and better prepare for classroom implementations.
help_authoring_meta_general_info.description: Help content explaining the purpose of the project info dialog window.

help_authoring_meta_author_info.value: If this project is a copy of another WISE project, the creator of the project family is identified as the original author (for attribution sake).
help_authoring_meta_author_info.description: Help content explaining the original author metadata field in the project info dialog window.

project_error_has_no_steps.description: The error text to be displayed when the project has no steps in it

preview_project_constraint_enabled_messa.description: The message shown in preview project mode when student navigation constraints are enabled.

preview_project_constraint_disabled_mess.value: Student navigation constraints are currently disabled. To preview project with all constraints,
preview_project_constraint_disabled_mess.description: The message shown in preview project mode when student navigation constraints are enabled.

score.description: The column header for the score in Show My Work

teacher_score.description: The column header for the teacher score

computer_score.description: The column header for the computer score

total_score.description: The column header for the total score

percent_project_completed.description: The column header for the project completion percentage

my_work_with_teacher_feedback_and_scores.value: My Work (with Teacher Feedback and Scores)
my_work_with_teacher_feedback_and_scores.description: The title for the my work dialog popup

you_have_new_feedback_from_teacher.value: You have new feedback from your teacher.
you_have_new_feedback_from_teacher.description: The message that shows up when the student logs in and has new teacher feedback

new_feedback_labeled_as_new.value: The new feedback is labeled as [New].
new_feedback_labeled_as_new.description: The message that shows up when the student logs in and has new teacher feedback

new_feedback.description: The header for the section that displays the student work that has new feedback

my_work.description: The header for the section that displays all of the student work

new_text.description: The text 'New' used to label new feedback

teacher_feedback.description: The label for the teacher feedback

your_teacher_hasnt_graded.value: Grading: Your Teacher hasn't graded your work yet.
your_teacher_hasnt_graded.description: The text to show that there is no feedback from the teacher yet

last_visited_on.description: The label to show when the student last visited the step

latest_work.description: The label to show the latest work

you_havent_visited_this_step.description: The text to show that the student hasn't visited the step yet

you_havent_submitted_work_for_this_step.value: You haven't submitted work for this step.
you_havent_submitted_work_for_this_step.description: The text to show that the student hasn't submitted work for the step yet

teacher_flagged_work.description: The title for the flagged work window in the student vle

there_are_no_flagged_items.description: The message that says there are no flagged items

choose_a_step.description: The label that tells the student to choose a step to view flagged work for in the flagged work window

question_instructions.description: The label for the step prompt when displaying flagged work for a step

sample_responses.description: The label for the student work that has been flagged for a step

anonymous.description: The label to specify that the team is anonymous

you_got_a_score_of.description: The text to display the score in the feedback popup

out_of.description: The text to display the score in the feedback popup

comments.description: The text to display the comments in the feedback popup

hints_viewAll.value: You must view all {0} before closing.
hints_viewAll.description: The message in the hints popup that says the student must view all hints before closing the hints popup

constraint_dialog_title.description: Title text for dialog alerting users about locked steps or activities (unable to visit because of navigation constraints)

constraint_allItems.description: Text to add after activity name when a constraint requires user to satisfy a requirement for all items in an activity

constraint_message_mustCompleteStepBefor.value: You must complete the current {0} before moving on.
constraint_message_mustCompleteStepBefor.description: The message shown to students telling them to complete work on the current step before moving on

constraint_message_mustCompleteActivityB.value: You must complete all items in the current {0} before moving on.
constraint_message_mustCompleteActivityB.description: The message shown to students telling them to complete work on the current activity before moving on

constraint_message_mustCompleteStepBefor.value: You must complete the current {0} before leaving.
constraint_message_mustCompleteStepBefor.description: The message shown to students telling them to complete work on the current step before exiting

constraint_message_mustCompleteActivityB.value: You must complete all items in the current {0} before leaving.
constraint_message_mustCompleteActivityB.description: The message shown to students telling them to complete work on the current activity before exiting

constraint_message_mustCompleteXBeforeVi.value: You must complete the following before viewing this item:
constraint_message_mustCompleteXBeforeVi.description: The message shown to students telling them to complete work on previous items before working on the selected step or activity

constraint_message_mustVisitXBeforeVisit.value: You must visit the following before viewing this item:
constraint_message_mustVisitXBeforeVisit.description: The message shown to students telling them to visit items before working on the selected step or activity

constraint_message_mustUnlockXBeforeVisi.value: You must unlock the following before viewing this item:
constraint_message_mustUnlockXBeforeVisi.description: The message shown to students telling them to unlock (make visitable) previous items before working on the selected step or activity

constraint_message_xMustHaveStatusY.description: The message shown to students telling them that the steps shown below must have 'statusType' set to 'statusValue' before they can work on the selected step
